ing: 1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans (chickpeas), drained and rinsed
des: "Quick and tasty little chickpea salad. Allowing the salad to chill in the fridge for a couple of hours before serving really melds the flavors together."
ins: Mix garbanzo beans, Parmesan cheese, parsley, basil, lemon juice, olive oil, and garlic together in a bowl; chill in refrigerator for flavors to blend, 1 to 2 hours.
